original_text: And a certain man drew a bow at a venture, and smote the king of Israel between the joints of the harness: therefore he said to his chariot man, Turn thine hand, that thou mayest carry me out of the host; for I am wounded.
korean_text: 한 사람이 무심코 활을 당겨 이스라엘 왕의 갑옷 솔기를 쏜지라 왕이 그의 병거 모는 자에게 이르되 내가 부상하였으니 네 손을 돌려 나를 진중에서 나가게 하라 하였으나

sentences.original_text: And a certain man drew a bow at a venture
and smote the king of Israel
between the joints of the harness
therefore he said to his chariot man
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그는 자기 병거를 모는 사람에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: that thou mayest carry me out of the host
